Let us remove physical & cultural barriers, build resilient societies & create opportunities that truly leave no one behind.
— @AntonioGuterres on Sunday’s Int'l Day of Persons with Disabilities https://t.co/VvUke48bHy https://t.co/ye3BKdyEUn

On any given day, @WFP has 5000 trucks🚚, 20 ships🚢 and 70 planes✈ on the move, delivering food and other assistance to those in most need.
 https://t.co/LuVn8FtPA3

It's the 21st century, but slavery still exists.

On Intl #EndSlavery Day learn how to recognize modern slavery & raise your voice for those who can't: https://t.co/8kfQCXWoo3 https://t.co/QthCHkVSWl

Portuguese @NacoesUnidas
Russian @UnitedNationsRU

Over 40 million children women & men live in modern slavery. 

On Intl #EndSlavery Day, find out how you can make a difference: https://t.co/PyzQ7T3Pi5 https://t.co/UvHBpm0WY8
Intimate partner violence is the most common form of violence experienced by women globally. https://t.co/ISvKgeUenF #16days #orangetheworld https://t.co/taQGADiJlq

There are more slaves today than at any other time in history.
Saturday is #EndSlavery Day. https://t.co/IsXEmy7wPz
Thanks UN Messenger of Peace Charlize Theron for continued support & commitment to #GlobalGoals & more. https://t.co/mOZiBA9zKS

Modern slavery is all around us, but most people don't even realize it.

On Saturday's Intl #EndSlavery Day, see how you can make a difference: https://t.co/r0QB0LPERF #50FF https://t.co/Gb2MoRs2mV
In 2018, @UNOCHA predicts that conflict will remain the main driver of humanitarian needs, while natural disasters will also cause many people to need emergency aid. https://t.co/z4eifdKfcL

Welcome to the UN family @deespeak!

As the new @UNEP Goodwill Ambassador for India, Dia will help raise awareness of environmental issues.
https://t.co/KGPrGlp0gL

AIDS-related deaths have almost halved since 2005 but 17M people living with HIV still don't have access to treatment.
Friday is #WorldAIDSDay: https://t.co/lmTsWxSRvR https://t.co/gvkwxjfbpY
Friday: @JapanMissionUN takes on rotating Security Council presidency for the month of December https://t.co/52qL1vMcxM

Achieving #GlobalGoals, which include ending the AIDS epidemic, depends heavily on ensuring the right to health.
On #WorldAIDSDay see how you can support #Myrighttohealth: https://t.co/HstPS1TAB0 https://t.co/FFidenVdBf

Ahead of key meeting on migration in Mexico, @UNICEF appeals to 🌎 leaders to take action to keep #ChildrenUprooted safe & protect their rights. https://t.co/E7qi71znUB
https://t.co/aUuD7qTPsR

1.8 million people acquire HIV every year. #Myrighttohealth means access to HIV prevention.

More from @UNAIDS on Friday's #WorldAIDSDay➡️ https://t.co/HstPS1TAB0 https://t.co/yeM46Gjcb1
Friday's #WorldAIDSDay focuses on the challenges people around the world face in exercising their right to health: https://t.co/HstPS2bbsy #myrighttohealth https://t.co/vem51INQkm

Respect
Safety
Dignity for all.

Let’s #JoinTogether in the fight against xenophobia & discrimination: https://t.co/O1EgeC9Ml8 https://t.co/jRUcQbzfLW
Now: Security Council meeting on destruction & trafficking of cultural heritage by terrorist groups & in armed conflict. Watch: https://t.co/WhwXXmUzNN

From Rwanda to Thailand, people everywhere help #OrangeTheWorld & take a stand to end violence against women!

3 refugee chefs from Yemen, Syria & Iran cooked lunch for students in France, introducing new flavours as well as information about @Refugees 
https://t.co/nuAGKqAyXL

In Yemen, lack of immediate & unhindered access to people who urgently need food assistance means that millions are on the brink of famine.

To save more lives, more access is needed. https://t.co/o5TgLDUYBf https://t.co/Spo2bfpkyF

13.1 million people require humanitarian assistance in Syria. Entering 7th year of crisis, the scale, severity & complexity of needs remain overwhelming.

More info via @UNOCHA here: https://t.co/06C0Yq0WML https://t.co/rCsUtqztzV
The importance of regional organizations grows with every decade that passes -- @antonioguterres at AU-EU Summit in Côte d'Ivoire https://t.co/foIpTsIKJ2 https://t.co/EFvNN6tdY6

Starting soon: Security Council meeting on non-proliferation & the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea. Watch live: https://t.co/iuT9bIBp48

The Intercultural Innovation Award identifies & supports projects that promote intercultural dialogue & inclusive societies. #iiawardNYC 

Details: https://t.co/c8f9tttCGn https://t.co/20xd4kRbcQ

After unprecedented global success in malaria control, progress has stalled.
We need to do more to #EndMalaria

Now is the time to end the conflict by establishing an independent Palestinian State, living side by side in peace & security with the State of Israel - @antonioguterres on Wednesday's #PalestineDay. https://t.co/eWcbldutfr https://t.co/3cpi3YZPhk

1 in 10 medical products in developing countries is substandard or falsified. This means that people are taking medicines that fail to treat or prevent disease. https://t.co/8dodDkNeBO
Wednesday’s #PalestineDay marks the 1947 #UNGA Partition Resolution: https://t.co/eWcbldcRQR https://t.co/cS2HPZimcf
Young refugees and Irish teens #JoinTogether at sea, learning how to sail and learning from each other ⛵️ https://t.co/0m5sZHfyFV

With a bike, a girl can travel to school safely to get education to create a better future for herself & her community.

On #GivingTuesday help a girl in Malawi get to school through @GirlUp 🚴‍♀️ https://t.co/cyV703R3Dt #SchoolCycle https://t.co/zO4wVzabol

Discriminatory practices,
→increase vulnerability to violence 
→cause arbitrary arrest & detention 
→violate the right to privacy & non-discrimination

Women & girls do not have a price tag.

Help ensure nobody goes to bed with an empty stomach: https://t.co/YF9dyGmD1X #GlobalGoals https://t.co/W68s3ocvFA

The UN: 

Feeds 80M ppl
Supplies vaccines for 45% of 🌍's children
Protects 65M people forced to flee

Fights poverty
Promotes human rights
Prevents conflict through diplomacy

And much more: https://t.co/MGT7G5Mqxj https://t.co/81EwPHuT1Z

✔️Safe & affordable housing
